Series.Actors: |Bob Odenkirk|Jonathan Banks|Michael McKean|Raymond Cruz|Barry Shabaka Henley|Michael Mando|Rhea Seehorn|Patrick Fabian|
Series.Overview: We meet him when the man who will become Saul Goodman is known as Jimmy McGill, a small-time lawyer searching for his destiny and, more immediately, hustling to make ends meet. Working alongside, and, often, against Jimmy, is ‘fixer’ Mike Erhmantraut. The series tracks Jimmy's transformation into the man who puts ‘criminal’ in ‘criminal lawyer’.
